title: Advanced Engineering Mathematics (6th Ed)(gnv64)
description: Advanced Engineering Mathematics (6th Ed) by Dennis G. Zill Jones & Bartlett Learning | September 2016 | ISBN-10: 1284105903 | PDF | 1024 pages | 16.6 mb Modern and comprehensive, the new sixth edition of award-winning author, Dennis G. Zill’s Advanced Engineering Mathematics is a compendium of topics that are most often covered in courses in engineering mathematics, and is extremely flexible to meet the unique needs of courses ranging from ordinary differential equations, to vector calculus, to partial differential equations. A key strength of this best-selling text is the author’s emphasis on differential equations as mathematical models, discussing the constructs and pitfalls of each. An accessible writing style and robust pedagogical aids guide students through difficult concepts with thoughtful explanations, clear examples, interesting applications, and contributed project problems. CONTENTS Preface PART 1 Ordinary Differential Equations 1 1 Introduction to Differential Equations 3 2 First-Order Differential Equations 33 3 Higher-Order Differential Equations 105 4 The Laplace Transform 211 5 Series Solutions of Linear Differential Equations 261 6 Numerical Solutions of Ordinary Differential Equations 297 PART 2 Vectors, Matrices, and Vector Calculus 319 7 Vectors 321 8 Matrices 367 9 Vector Calculus 479 PART 3 Systems of Differential Equations 589 10 Systems of Linear Differential Equations 591 11 Systems of Nonlinear Differential Equations 629 PART 4 Partial Differential Equations 669 12 Orthogonal Functions and Fourier Series 671 13 Boundary-Value Problems in Rectangular Coordinates 707 14 Boundary-Value Problems in Other Coordinate Systems 747 15 Integral Transform Method 767 16 Numerical Solutions of Partial Differential Equations 801 PART 5 Complex Analysis 817 17 Functions of a Complex Variable 819 18 Integration in the Complex Plane 853 19 Series and Residues 877 20 Conformal Mappings 911 Appendices I Derivative and Integral Formulas APP-2 II Gamma Function APP-4 III Table of Laplace Transforms APP-6 IV Conformal Mappings APP-9 Answers to Selected Odd-Numbered Problems ANS-1 Index I-1 https://s26.postimg.org/6r4ged4c9/Advanced_Engineering_Mathematics_6th_Ed.jpg
